Cruise ships are prohibited from calling at any of the sea ports except the disembarkation of a returning South African crew and a permanent resident.

Passenger vessels will be allowed to call at any South African sea port only for the following purposes:
(a) Disembarking South African crew;
(b) Disembarking returning South African citizens and holders of permanent
resident permit; and

No crew changes are permitted in all commercial ports until further notice.
